right.selectPrompt: Select a group on the left to manage its permissions.

toast.loadAllError: We couldn't load the groups. Please try again.
toast.detailError: We couldn't load this group's details.
toast.createNameRequired: Please enter a name for the group.
toast.createError: We couldn't create the group. Please try again.
toast.saveError: We couldn't update permissions. Please try again.

confirm.deleteText: Are you sure you want to delete the group "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
confirm.fail: Something went wrong while confirming the action.
